Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique offering is not just a product but a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at an introductory price of $14500. This special offer is designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
